comments.body: @turbaszek thanks for #10827. Now its merged, i've updated this test to this more natural syntax.

        tsk_1 >> group234 >> tsk_5

    # pylint: disable=no-member

comments.body:
One more empty line is needed here to please static check.

On the other hand, I agree with you on https://github.com/apache/airflow/issues/12757#issuecomment-739147569 . Will do the discussion there.

```suggestion
    @task_group_decorator('task_group1')
```

So we test passing group id via arg (instead of kwarg)

I would have expected this to fail: this is three _separate_ task groups, all with the same name.

Calling the same TG more than once is when I would expect the `__1` suffix to be added, but having _actual_ duplicate TG ids for different groups I think should be an error case.
Hmmm, given there's no way to override the name of a TG, true.

    node_ids = {
